reviews.text:
Today we're at Wild Wild Wet, wonderfully busy and crowded water park. Lucky to get the last cabana for the day. The weather was just lovely, a bit downcast but no rain. Lots of food outlets to feast on.
And E!Hub was great with everything you need, from f&b outlets, japanese supermarket, electronic to gadget stores, hairdressers to manicure/pedicure services. There's live entertainment and the cleaners always on standby to do their cleaning job.
Its was a wonderful weekend outing for the family...
Nice and great place for young and old. Some eatery open as early as 8:00 A.M. for breakfast. Killiney, Yakun as well as Uncle Tan are great place for local choices. Service are fast and friendly.

Market Square @ Downtown East
Some top restaurants... dining... and entertainment in the heart of the refreshed place, delectable eateries and retail spaces.

LOVE the soup at "Yam's Kitchen"
A Chinese restaurant that serves Quality food prepared from the freshest raw ingredients.

Love the amenities here!

Good mix of lifestyle, Health, Family and fashion shops. A good place to visit for Family (family friendly).

Might be lacking in big brands (not an issue for me) but you have a good variety of dining choices, fun and entertainment for the kids (Tayo station and roller skate ring).

And last but not least, it has Don Don Donki!
nice place for lunch n dinner lots of food outlets...all kinds of everything..crowds usually on weekends... there are free parking during lunch weekdays....go try it out
